Class SmartTargetEnemy

  • java.lang.Object
    • MoveableEntity
      • Enemy
        • SmartTargetEnemy
  • public class SmartTargetEnemy
extends Enemy
    This class represents one of the four enemies, the Smart Target Enemy. This is an attempt of implementing the A* algorithm which finds the shortest path.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class MoveableEntity

        position

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void AstarSearch​(SmartTargetEnemy.Node source, SmartTargetEnemy.Node goal)
      This class performs the A* search by going through the neighbour of the source node that is closer to the goal node than the other neighbours.

      Get the image representing the Smart Target Enemy.

      • heuristicValue

        public double heuristicValue​(Position enemy,
                             Position player)
        This class return a value that helps in finding the shortest path between two position by aproximating the length of the path. This value is called heuristic.
        Parameters:
        enemy - position of the smart enemy.
        player - position of the player.
        Returns:
        the heuristic value representing the aproximate length.

      • nextMove

        Decide on the next move of the enemy.
        Specified by:
        nextMove in class Enemy
        Parameters:
        cells - An array of the cells.
        playerPosition - The player's position.

      • AstarSearch

        public void AstarSearch​(SmartTargetEnemy.Node source,
                        SmartTargetEnemy.Node goal)
        This class performs the A* search by going through the neighbour of the source node that is closer to the goal node than the other neighbours.
        Parameters:
        source - the starting node.
        goal - the ending node.
